AFFECT /qml/device/view/documentview/DeviceSceneView.qml
    IMPORT net.sudoku 1.0
    TRAVERSE FocusScope > ScenePenInputHandler
        REBUILD onStrokeCompleted
            LOCATE BEFORE { completedStroke } INSERT {
                PuzzleManager.line(stroke);
            }
        END REBUILD
    END TRAVERSE
END AFFECT
